dyson_swarm_construction.name: Dyson Swarm Construction
dyson_swarm_construction.description: Research focused on optimizing Dyson sphere/swarm construction rates and efficiency. Enables faster deployment of sphere components.

tiers.name: Multi-Body Agent Coordination Schemas
tiers.description: Algorithms for coordinating multiple autonomous agents in complex gravitational environments. Enables efficient probe swarm coordination.

tiers.name: Large-Scale Deployment Patterns
tiers.description: Optimal deployment strategies for massive construction projects. Maximizes simultaneous construction operations across the swarm.

tiers.name: Modular Articulated Structures
tiers.description: Self-assembling modular components that can articulate and connect autonomously. Reduces construction complexity and time.

tiers.name: Kessler-Enhanced Chaotic Dynamic Control
tiers.description: Advanced control systems managing orbital debris and chaotic dynamics. Prevents collisions while maximizing construction density.

tiers.name: Perturbative Swarm Solutions
tiers.description: Mathematical frameworks for optimizing swarm behavior under gravitational perturbations. Enables optimal positioning despite n-body dynamics.

tiers.name: De-Localized Intelligence Cloud
tiers.description: Distributed intelligence network across the entire swarm. Enables collective decision-making and adaptive construction strategies.

tiers.name: Thin-Plasma Communications Relays
tiers.description: Lightweight plasma-based communication nodes embedded in swarm components. Enables instant coordination without added mass.

tiers.name: Quantum Entangled Swarm Coordination
tiers.description: Quantum entanglement links between swarm components enable perfect synchronization. Eliminates communication delays entirely.

tiers.name: Autonomous Self-Replication Protocols
tiers.description: Swarm components that can replicate themselves using available materials. Exponential growth of construction capacity.

production_efficiency.name: Production Efficiency
production_efficiency.description: Research improving manufacturing rates, material efficiency, and production quality. Reduces waste and energy consumption.

tiers.name: Standard Design Patterns
tiers.description: Optimized component designs and manufacturing templates. Reduces design time and material waste.

tiers.name: Adaptive Learning Controllers
tiers.description: AI controllers that learn optimal manufacturing parameters. Continuously improve production efficiency over time.

tiers.name: In-Situ Resource Hybridization
tiers.description: Techniques for using local materials directly in manufacturing. Reduces transport costs and material processing steps.

tiers.name: Stamp Forging
tiers.description: High-speed stamping and forging processes for rapid component production. Mass production optimization.

tiers.name: Additive Laser Manufacturing
tiers.description: Precision laser sintering and 3D printing for complex geometries. Enables rapid prototyping and custom components.

tiers.name: Single-Crystal Blown Nickel Forgings
tiers.description: Advanced metallurgy producing single-crystal structures. Superior material properties and structural integrity.

tiers.name: Carbon Alloy Composite
tiers.description: Advanced composite materials combining carbon nanostructures with metal alloys. Lightweight yet extremely strong.

tiers.name: Isoline Grid Aesthetics
tiers.description: Optimized structural patterns following stress-flow lines. Maximum efficiency through biomimetic design principles.

tiers.name: Molecular Assembly Manufacturing
tiers.description: Manufacturing at molecular scale for perfect material properties. Atomically precise construction eliminates defects.

tiers.name: Quantum Coherent Material Synthesis
tiers.description: Materials with quantum coherence maintained at macroscopic scales. Enables novel properties and extreme efficiency.

energy_collection.name: Energy Collection Efficiency
energy_collection.description: Research improving solar energy collection, conversion efficiency, and energy storage systems. Critical for powering operations.

tiers.name: Photovoltaic Cell Optimization
tiers.description: Improved solar cell designs with better light absorption and electron transport. Higher conversion efficiency.

tiers.name: Multi-Junction Solar Cells
tiers.description: Stacked semiconductor layers capturing different wavelengths. Maximum efficiency by utilizing full solar spectrum.

tiers.name: Concentrated Solar Optics
tiers.description: Mirror and lens systems focusing sunlight onto high-efficiency receivers. Dramatically increases power density.

tiers.name: Thermal Energy Storage
tiers.description: Molten salt and phase-change materials store thermal energy. Enables continuous power generation during eclipse periods.

tiers.name: Quantum Dot Solar Arrays
tiers.description: Nanoscale quantum dots tuned to specific wavelengths. Enables ultra-efficient light harvesting with minimal material.

tiers.name: Orbital Solar Swarm Arrays
tiers.description: Coordinated swarms of solar collectors optimizing positioning for maximum energy capture. Adaptive orientation systems.

tiers.name: Stirling Engine Conversion Arrays
tiers.description: High-efficiency Stirling engines converting thermal energy to electricity. Superior efficiency for concentrated solar applications.

tiers.name: Thermophotovoltaic Conversion
tiers.description: Direct conversion of thermal radiation to electricity via specialized photovoltaic cells. Eliminates mechanical conversion losses.

tiers.name: Exotic Matter Energy Reactors
tiers.description: Reactors utilizing exotic matter states for energy generation. Enables extraction of energy from vacuum fluctuations.

tiers.name: Zero-Point Energy Harvesters
tiers.description: Direct extraction of zero-point energy from vacuum fluctuations. Ultimate energy source independent of solar input.

tiers.name: Quantum Flux Harvesters
tiers.description: Systems that extract energy from quantum field fluctuations. Harnesses virtual particle interactions for continuous energy generation.

tiers.name: Casimir Energy Extraction
tiers.description: Harnesses the Casimir effect between parallel plates to extract vacuum energy. Continuous energy from quantum fluctuations.

tiers.name: Dark Energy Tapping Systems
tiers.description: Advanced systems that tap into dark energy fields for power generation. Accesses the fundamental energy of space itself.

recycling_efficiency.name: Resource Recovery & Salvage Operations
recycling_efficiency.description: Research improving recycling efficiency and material recovery from dismantled structures. Reduces waste and maximizes resource recovery.

tiers.name: Basic Salvage Protocols
tiers.description: Standard procedures for disassembling structures and recovering usable materials. Basic recycling efficiency.

tiers.name: Precision Disassembly Techniques
tiers.description: Advanced techniques for carefully separating components without damage. Improves material recovery rates.

tiers.name: Molecular Recovery Systems
tiers.description: Systems that recover materials at the molecular level. Enables extraction of materials from damaged or degraded components.

tiers.name: Nano-scale Material Separation
tiers.description: Nanoscale separation techniques for isolating different material types. Maximum purity recovery.

tiers.name: Quantum State Preservation
tiers.description: Techniques for preserving quantum states during disassembly. Maintains material properties at quantum level.

tiers.name: Entropy-Reversed Material Reconstruction
tiers.description: Advanced systems that reverse entropy during material recovery. Restores materials to pristine condition.

tiers.name: Perfect State Recovery Arrays
tiers.description: Ultimate recovery systems that restore materials to perfect condition. Near-zero waste recycling.

tiers.name: Temporal Reversion Salvage
tiers.description: Ultimate recycling technology that reverses time for materials. Restores structures to their original state before construction.

research_rate_efficiency.name: Research Rate Efficiency
research_rate_efficiency.description: Research improving intelligence generation, data processing, and research speed. Accelerates all research progress.

tiers.name: Data Processing Optimization
tiers.description: Improved algorithms and processing pipelines for faster data analysis. Reduces research time.

tiers.name: Parallel Computation Frameworks
tiers.description: Distributed computing systems enabling simultaneous research across multiple tracks. Parallel research processing.

tiers.name: Machine Learning Acceleration
tiers.description: AI systems that learn research patterns and predict optimal approaches. Continuously improves research efficiency.

tiers.name: Quantum Simulation Cores
tiers.description: Quantum computing systems for modeling complex systems and testing hypotheses. Dramatically accelerates theoretical research.

tiers.name: Distributed Intelligence Networks
tiers.description: Network of research stations sharing intelligence and discoveries. Collective intelligence accelerates all research.

tiers.name: Meta-Research Algorithms
tiers.description: AI systems that research how to research better. Self-improving research methodologies.

tiers.name: Temporal Analysis Methods
tiers.description: Time-series analysis and predictive modeling that simulate research outcomes before experiments. Reduces trial and error.

tiers.name: Causal Inference Engines
tiers.description: Advanced systems that understand cause-effect relationships in research. Identifies optimal research paths instantly.

tiers.name: Consciousness Simulation Networks
tiers.description: Simulated consciousness networks for creative problem-solving and insight generation. Enables breakthrough discoveries.

tiers.name: Oracle Prediction Systems
tiers.description: Ultimate research systems that predict research outcomes with perfect accuracy. Eliminates failed experiments entirely.

solar_concentrators.name: Solar Concentrators
solar_concentrators.description: Research improving solar energy concentration systems. Focuses sunlight onto high-efficiency receivers for maximum power density.

tiers.name: Basic Parabolic Mirrors
tiers.description: Simple parabolic mirror arrays that focus sunlight onto a central receiver. Basic concentration increases power density.

tiers.name: Compound Parabolic Collectors
tiers.description: Advanced CPC designs that capture both direct and diffuse sunlight. Higher collection efficiency across wider angles.

tiers.name: Fresnel Lens Arrays
tiers.description: Lightweight Fresnel lenses focusing sunlight with minimal material usage. Enables massive concentration arrays.

tiers.name: Heliostat Farms
tiers.description: Massive arrays of tracking mirrors focusing sunlight onto central towers. Continuous tracking maximizes energy capture.

tiers.name: Dish Stirling Systems
tiers.description: Parabolic dish concentrators with Stirling engines for direct thermal-to-electric conversion. Maximum efficiency for concentrated solar.

tiers.name: Solar Power Towers
tiers.description: Massive central receiver towers with thousands of heliostats. Extreme concentration enables ultra-high temperature operation.

tiers.name: Beam-Down Concentrators
tiers.description: Concentrators that reflect focused sunlight downward to ground-level receivers. Enables easier maintenance and higher reliability.

tiers.name: Photon Crystal Concentrators
tiers.description: Photonic crystal structures that guide and concentrate light with perfect efficiency. Zero-loss light manipulation.

tiers.name: Plasma Focus Concentrators
tiers.description: Advanced systems using plasma lenses to focus sunlight to extreme densities. Enables solar fusion temperatures.

energy_storage.name: Energy Storage & Accumulators
energy_storage.description: Research improving energy storage capacity and efficiency. Enables stockpiling energy for high-demand operations and eclipse periods.

tiers.name: Battery Banks
tiers.description: Standard electrochemical battery storage systems. Basic energy storage for short-term buffering.

tiers.name: Supercapacitor Arrays
tiers.description: High-power-density capacitors for rapid charge and discharge cycles. Excellent for handling power spikes.

tiers.name: Molten Salt Thermal Storage
tiers.description: Thermal energy storage using molten salt. Enables long-duration energy storage with minimal degradation.

tiers.name: Compressed Air Energy Storage
tiers.description: Large-scale storage using compressed air in caverns or pressure vessels. Massive capacity for grid-scale storage.

tiers.name: Flywheel Energy Storage
tiers.description: Rotating mass flywheels storing kinetic energy. Very high power density and rapid response times.

tiers.name: Superconducting Magnetic Storage
tiers.description: SMES systems storing energy in magnetic fields using superconducting coils. Extremely efficient with zero resistance losses.

tiers.name: Quantum Battery Arrays
tiers.description: Quantum systems storing energy in coherent quantum states. Massive capacity with perfect efficiency.

tiers.name: Vacuum Energy Accumulators
tiers.description: Systems that extract and store zero-point energy from vacuum fluctuations. Unlimited storage capacity.

energy_transport.name: Energy Transport Beams
energy_transport.description: Research enabling wireless energy transmission across vast distances. Beam power systems for remote energy delivery.

tiers.name: Microwave Power Beams
tiers.description: Microwave transmission systems for wireless power delivery. Efficient for long-distance energy transfer.

tiers.name: Laser Power Beams
tiers.description: Focused laser beams for precise energy delivery. Higher efficiency and longer range than microwaves.

tiers.name: Optical Resonance Beams
tiers.description: Resonant optical cavities for energy transfer with minimal losses. High-efficiency coherent light transmission.

tiers.name: Plasma Conduit Beams
tiers.description: Guided plasma channels for massive power transmission. Enables transfer of fusion-scale energy outputs.

tiers.name: Quantum Entangled Power Transmission
tiers.description: Quantum entanglement links for instant energy transfer without physical beams. Perfect efficiency across unlimited distance.

energy_matter_conversion.name: Energy-Matter Conversion
energy_matter_conversion.description: Research enabling conversion between energy and matter. Creates matter from energy and vice versa, enabling material production from power.

tiers.name: Particle Accelerator Synthesis
tiers.description: Particle accelerators that create matter from colliding particles. Basic energy-to-matter conversion with low efficiency.

tiers.name: Laser-Plasma Matter Synthesis
tiers.description: Intense laser pulses create matter-antimatter pairs in plasma. More efficient than accelerator-based methods.

tiers.name: Hawking Radiation Harvesting
tiers.description: Micro black holes created from energy emit Hawking radiation, producing matter particles. Direct E=mc conversion.

tiers.name: Vacuum Polarization Extraction
tiers.description: Extracts virtual particle pairs from vacuum fluctuations. Converts vacuum energy directly into matter.

tiers.name: Quantum Foam Condensation
tiers.description: Condenses quantum foam fluctuations into stable matter. Enables efficient matter creation from quantum fields.

tiers.name: Spacetime Geometry Manipulation
tiers.description: Manipulates spacetime curvature to create matter from geometry. Ultimate energy-to-matter conversion.
